description: Zoho Bookings is an appointment scheduling software for managing bookings, services, and customer appointments.

actions.name: bookAppointment
actions.description: Book an appointment for a customer for a desired service

actions.name: cancelAppointment
actions.description: Update the status of a booking (cancel, complete, or mark as no-show)

actions.name: fetchAvailability
actions.description: Fetch availability of appointments across services

actions.name: getAppointmentDetails
actions.description: Get details of an appointment using its booking ID

actions.name: rescheduleAppointment
actions.description: Reschedule an appointment to a different time or to a different staff
